players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Voted for Alice. Keep an eye on Bob."
You: "Will watch Bob closely. Any info on Charlie?"
Bob: "Will keep Charlie's death in mind. Any suspicious behavior?"
Diana: "Staying cautious. Alice's detective work is key."
You: "Investigating Bob next. Stay vigilant."
Bob: "Will keep an eye on Bob and Alice. Stay cautious."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
